content:
DatePickerFormat Enum

Definition

Specifies date formats for a DatePicker.

In this Article

public enum DatePickerFormat
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
DatePickerFormat

Fields

Long

Specifies that the date should be displayed by using unabbreviated days of the week and month names. This value displays a string that is equal to the string that is returned by the stem.DateTime.ToLongDateString* method.
Short

Specifies that the date should be displayed by using abbreviated days of the week and month names. This value displays a string that is equal to the string that is returned by the stem.DateTime.ToShortDateString* method.
